caption.p: Fitting curve of the four kinds of polyethylene in ln j- E 1/2 coordinates: ( a) Fitting curve of the LDPE in lnj-E1/2 coordinates; ( b) Fitting curve of the LLDPE in lnj-E1/2 coordinates; ( c) Fitting curve of the LDPE in lnj-E1/2 coordinates; ( d) Fitting curve of the LDPE in lnj-E1/2 coordinates.
